title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 point maximum

Translation (1 point):

  • When/at the time that they (have) decided (upon), resolved, determined, made up their mind(s), established, set up (in their minds)

  • Whenever they decide, etc.

Identification (1 point): Indicative
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.
